tool_description: Monitors domain portfolios for upcoming expirations, generates alerts, and provides renewal recommendations with customizable notification thresholds.

domain_list.description: List of domains to monitor for expiration

alert_thresholds.description: Days before expiration to trigger alerts (e.g., [90, 30, 7])

include_suggestions.description: Include renewal recommendations and cost estimates

filter_status.description: Filter domains by status: all, expiring_soon, expired, auto_renew_enabled

error_messages: Domain list too large: Maximum 500 domains can be monitored in a single request.
Invalid domain format: One or more domains in the list are not valid.
Invalid alert threshold: Alert thresholds must be positive integers between 1 and 365.
Invalid filter status: Status filter must be one of: all, expiring_soon, expired, auto_renew_enabled.
Unable to retrieve expiration data: Could not access expiration information for one or more domains.
usage: Provide a list of domains to monitor and optionally set alert thresholds and filtering options. The tool checks expiration dates and generates alerts based on your criteria.

alert_summary.description: Summary of expiration alerts and recommended actions
